title: Im quitting league and it Ain't your fault...
body:
I'm full-blown going to college in the fall. 
I'm going for a bachelors in computer science.
I'm also quitting for my wife whom I promised I would make As and Bs and receive recognition via the "Deans list".
One of my biggest regrets however is not escaping bronze. 
Although I feel that all bronze players have increased in skill at the game making it harder to climb. 
Reasoning: you spend time doing something you are bound to get better. Those around you that do the same thing you do get better as well.
Anyways I'm still gonna post on the boards but I won't play anymore. Hell I don't even watch league analysis content anymore....
Also I found this twilight zone video relevant to today. Check it out.
https://youtu.be/oADlQPJ_Zfc
